SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_name as gemingxianbeiName ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_uuid_number as gemingxianbeiUuidNumber ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_shengchen as gemingxianbeiShengchen ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_jiri as gemingxianbeiJiri ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_zhuzhi as gemingxianbeiZhuzhi ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_photo as gemingxianbeiPhoto ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_types as gemingxianbeiTypes ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_file as gemingxianbeiFile ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_clicknum as gemingxianbeiClicknum ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_content as gemingxianbeiContent ,gemingxianbei.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_delete as gemingxianbeiDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM gemingxianbei_liuyan a left JOIN gemingxianbei gemingxianbei ON a.gemingxianbei_id = gemingxianbei.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.gemingxianbei_id = #{params.gemingxianbeiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.gemingxianbei_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.gemingxianbeiLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.gemingxianbei_id IS NOT NULL
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gemingxianbeiName},'%')
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.gemingxianbeiUuidNumber},'%')
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_shengchen like CONCAT('%',#{params.gemingxianbeiShengchen},'%')
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_jiri like CONCAT('%',#{params.gemingxianbeiJiri},'%')
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_zhuzhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.gemingxianbeiZhuzhi},'%')
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_types = #{params.gemingxianbeiTypes}
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_clicknum >= #{params.gemingxianbeiClicknumStart}
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_clicknum <= #{params.gemingxianbeiClicknumEnd}
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_clicknum = #{params.gemingxianbeiClicknum}
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gemingxianbeiContent},'%')
and gemingxianbei.shangxia_types = #{params.shangxiaTypes}
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_delete >= #{params.gemingxianbeiDeleteStart}
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_delete <= #{params.gemingxianbeiDeleteEnd}
and gemingxianbei.gemingxianbei_delete = #{params.gemingxianbeiDelete}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
